about_the_game:
Tinheung & Sayuri is a game of visual novel. The background is set in a corner of Shenzhen, China. Tong Tinheung, who has just graduated, came to a company she was not interested in and engaged in a job she was not interested in. When she decided to resign, she had a wonderful connection with the Japanese leader of the supplier company, Matsuzaki Sayuri, and had a feeling of curiosity and longing for it. In order to meet Sayuri, Tinheung decided to postpone her resignation plan and has been fiercely and directly pouring out her love to Sayuri...
This is a short Yuri story across age, nationality, and gender.


[game features]
Yuri
Low Price
Shenzhen citizens may feel cordial

[notes]
Please search '柚原堂'（YauYuenTong） and follow our Weibo/Bilibili/Twitter account to contact with us.
